japanese:
イヤッホーー！！　やっぱり夏は最高だな！
お前らもそう思うだろ！？
translation:
YAHOOOOO!! Summer is really the BEST!
Don't you guys think so?!

japanese: ええと、どうだろうね。
translation: Um, I'm not sure.

japanese:
どうした元気がないぞ！
ほら、もっと声出して行こう！
translation:
What's wrong, why are you so quiet?
Come on, let's make some noise!

japanese:
海だから声を出すのですか？
理解ができませんが……。
translation:
Are you shouting because we're at the beach?
I don't really understand...

japanese:
（だ、ダメだ！
　もう完全にいぶかしがられてるぞ！）
translation:
(O-oh no!
 They're totally suspicious of me now!)

japanese:
（どうするんだ、らいは！
　そろそろこのキャラを続けるのも限界だぞ！？）
translation:
(What should I do, Raiha?
 There's a limit to how long I can keep this act going,
 ya know?!)

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、みんなで楽しもうね！
頑張って！
translation:
Let's all have fun together, big bro!
Do your best!

japanese:
（うううっ！
　らいはの視線がまぶしすぎる！）
translation:
(Ooooohh!
 Raiha's gaze is too bright!)

japanese:
（ここはやはり兄として、妹の期待に
　応えてやらないといけないのか……！）
translation:
(As her older brother,
 I must meet her expectations, mustn't I?!)

japanese:
よ、よーし！
お前ら、どうする！
translation:
A-alright!
What are we gonna do?!

japanese: え？　どうするって何が？
translation: Huh? What are we gonna do? What do you mean?

japanese:
何が？　何が？
そうだなー、海と言えば……。
translation:
What? What?
Let's see, when you think of the beach...

japanese: うん、海と言えば？
translation: Yes, when you think of the beach?

japanese: スイカ割り！
translation: Watermelon splitting!

japanese: スイカがありません。
translation: We don't have a watermelon.

japanese:
そうだな！
じゃあ……沖まで泳ぐ！
translation:
That's right!
Alright... Then we swim out to sea!

japanese: 私は無理。
translation: I'm out.

japanese:
私もパスかな。
そこまでたっぷり泳ぎたいわけじゃないし。
translation:
I pass too.
I don't really feel like swimming that far.

japanese:
（くっ、食いつきが悪い！
　ええと、他にらいはがくれたアドバイスは……）
translation:
(Darn, they're not interested!
 Let's see, what other advice did Raiha give me...)

japanese: ビーチフラッグス……とか？
translation: How about...beach flags?

japanese: ビーチフラッグスって……。
translation: Beach flags?

japanese: ああ、砂浜を走って旗を取るやつ？
translation:
Oh, the game where you run along the beach
and grab a flag?

japanese:
そう、それだ！
たまには新しいことに挑戦してみるのもいいだろ？
translation:
That's right!
It's a good idea
to try something new once in a while, right?

japanese: でも、この炎天下の中で走るのってどうなのかしら。
translation: But is it okay to run around in this scorching heat?

japanese: （だよな！）
translation: (That's true!)

japanese:
旗を取るとき、頭から滑り込むんだよね？
なんだか痛そう。
translation:
When you grab the flag,
you have to slide head first, right?
That seems kind of painful.

japanese: （わかる！）
translation: (I know, right?!)

japanese: 髪に砂がつくのは、ちょっと……。
translation: Getting sand in my hair is a bit...

japanese: （女の子だもんな！）
translation: (They're girls, aren't they!)

japanese: それに私、あまり日に焼けたくないんだよね。
translation:
And also,
I don't really want to get too tanned,
you know?

japanese: （海を全否定かよ！）
translation: (Is she really rejecting the beach altogether?!)

japanese:
ビーチフラッグス、面白そう！
なんか踊る感じがしない？　肉が！
translation:
Beach flags sound interesting!
But doesn't it feel like we're gonna boil?
With our blood!

japanese: に、肉？
translation: O-our blood?

japanese:
血湧き肉躍るか！
さすが四葉だ、わかってるな！
translation:
You mean, your blood is boiling with excitement!
As expected of Yotsuba, you know what's up!

japanese: そんなことありませんよ～。
translation: No, I really don't...

japanese: ……私も面白そうだなーって思ってたわよ？
translation: ...I was thinking it would be fun too, you know?

japanese: 本当か、二乃！
translation: That so, Nino!

japanese: 私もやりたいって思ってた。
translation: I also wanted to try it.

japanese: おお、三玖もか！
translation: Oh, Miku too!

japanese: あー、これはやる流れ？
translation: Ah, looks like we're going to do this then?

japanese: そのようですね……。
translation: Seems like it...

japanese: というわけで、ルールの説明をしまーす！
translation: Alright, let me explain the rules!

japanese:
ルールは単純だよ。
一対一で勝負して、先に旗をとった人が勝ち。
translation:
They're pretty simple.
It's a one-on-one battle,
and whoever takes the flag first wins.

japanese: そして決勝は、勝ち抜けた３人で戦います！
translation:
And then, the final round
will be played by the three people who made it through!

japanese: 対戦相手はどう決めよっか。
translation: How should we decide who will face whom?

japanese: じゃんけんでいいんじゃない？
translation: Rock-paper-scissors works, doesn't it?

japanese:
そもそも１人余るよね。
７人だから。
translation:
Wait, we have one person left over, don't we?
There are seven of us.

japanese: あ、私は審判やるから！　大丈夫！
translation: Oh, I'll be the referee! It's okay!

japanese:
よーし、それじゃ対戦相手を決めるぞ！
せーのっ！　じゃんけん――
translation:
Okay, let's decide who's versus who then!
Ready, set, go! Rock-paper-scissors%p-2;――

japanese: 一試合目は、俺と二乃だな！
translation: The first match is between me and Nino!

japanese: それじゃ、旗を背にしてうつ伏せに寝てくださーい。
translation:
Alright,
please lie face down with the flag on your back.

japanese:
そして笛が鳴ったら旗めがけて走って、取る。
本当に単純ね。
translation:
Then, when the whistle blows,
run towards the flag and try to take it.
It's really that simple.

japanese: クックック、はたしてそうかな？
translation: Heh-heh-heh, is it really?

japanese: な、なに、その言い方。
translation: Wh-what do you mean by that?

japanese:
それでは、位置についてーー！
よーーーい！
translation:
Now, then, take your positions!
Ready... GO!

japanese: うらぁぁぁぁぁっ！！
translation: URRAAAAAHH!!

japanese:
あっ！
……砂浜だと、足を取られて上手く走れない！
translation:
Ah!
...The sand, my feet are sinking,
and it's hard to run!

japanese: うおぉぉぉぉぉぉぉぉっ！！
translation: WOOOOOOAAAAAAHHH!!

japanese: くう、いくらフー君でも勝ちは譲らないわよ！
translation:
Hmph, even if I'm up against you,
I won't let you win, Fu-kun!

japanese: ていうか、フータロー君は声の勢いだけだし。
translation:
I mean, the only momentum Futaro-kun has
is with his voice.

japanese:
ですね。
二乃でも追いつけそうですが、どうでしょう？
translation:
Right.
Nino seems to be catching up, but can she make it?

japanese: 頑張れ、フータロー。
translation: Hang in there, Futaro.

japanese: 二乃！　頑張ってー！
translation: Nino! Keep going!

japanese: （死ぬ、肺が破裂する！　足の裏が熱い！）
translation:
(I'm dying, my lungs are going to burst!
 And my feet are so hot!)

japanese: も、もうちょっと……！
translation: J-just a little more!

japanese:
しゃああああああ！！
とうっ！！
translation:
YEAAAAAAHH!!
THERE!!

japanese: よっしゃああああああ！
translation: I DID ITTTT!

japanese:
おおー！　ジャンプで距離を稼ぐとは。
フータロー君、マジだね。
translation:
Ohhh! Jumping to gain distance.
You're amazing, Futaro-kun!

japanese:
あーっ！　もう！
スタートで出遅れなければ勝てたのに！
translation:
Argh! Grr!
If only I didn't start so slow, I could have won!

japanese:
でも、真剣に走ってるフー君の横顔を
近くで見られて、得しちゃったかも……。
translation:
But I got to see Fu-kun's serious side up close,
so maybe that's a win...

japanese: よーし！　二乃さんに効果あり！
translation: Alright! It worked on Nino-san!

japanese: （な、慣れないことして体が……死ぬ……暑い……）
translation:
(I-I'm doing something I'm not used to
 and my body...is dying... It's hot...)

japanese:
お兄ちゃんは少し休んでてね。
じゃあ次は、一花さんと五月さんの勝負だよ。
translation:
Big bro, take a break for a bit.
Next up is Ichika-san and Itsuki-san's match.

japanese: やるからには負けないよ？
translation: I won't lose, you know?

japanese: ええ、真剣勝負ですね。
translation: Yes, it's a serious match.

japanese:
はぁはぁ……。
ふ、２人とも、く、悔いが残らないように、
が、が、がん、ばれ……。
translation:
Haah, haah...
S-so n-neither of you don't h-have any regrets.
D-d-do your, best...

japanese:
あの、言いたいことはわかりましたから、
休んでいてください。
translation:
Um, we understand what you want to say,
so please rest.

japanese:
それでは、２人とも位置についてー！
よーい――
translation:
Now then, both of you, take your positions!
Get ready%p-2;―――

japanese:
ねえ五月ちゃん。
やっぱりフータロー君、なんか変だよね？
translation:
Hey, Itsuki-chan.
Futaro-kun really is acting weird, isn't he?

japanese: ほら、今もなんか踊ってるし。
translation: See, he's even kind of dancing right now.

japanese:
え？　踊ってる？
別に普通に座ってるだけでは――
translation:
Huh? He's dancing?
He's just sitting normally, though%p-2;――

japanese: お先に～！
translation: See ya!

japanese: あっ、ちょっと、ズルいですよ！？
translation: Ah, hold on, that's CHEATING!!

japanese: 勝負の駆け引きってやつだよー！
translation: It's what they call tactics!

japanese:
五月さーん！
まだまだ取り戻せるよ、頑張ってー！
translation:
Itsuki-san!
You can still make a comeback! Do your best!

japanese: ……らいはちゃんに無様な姿は見せられませんっ！
translation: ...I can't let Raiha-chan see such an embarrassing sight!

japanese:
え？　え？
五月ちゃん、速くない！？
translation:
Huh? Huh?
Itsuki-chan, you're pretty fast, aren't you?!

japanese:
五月！　見せてみろ、土壇場の大逆転を！
そして明日に向かって光り輝け！
translation:
Itsuki!
Show us a dramatic comeback at the last minute,
and shine on for tomorrow!

japanese: うう！？
translation: Oooohh?!

japanese:
お！　スピードが落ちた！
フータロー君、ナイスアシストー！
translation: Ah! Your speed is dropping! Nice assist, Futaro-kun!

japanese: いよっと！　はい、旗ゲット！
translation: And there! Alright, I got the flag!

japanese: 一花さんの勝ちー！
translation: Ichika-san wins!

japanese: はぁ、はぁ……ダメでしたか。
translation: *pant* *pant* I was too slow, huh?

japanese: 残念な結果だが、良い勝負だったぞ！
translation: It's a shame, but what a good match!

japanese:
なんですか、明日に向かって光り輝けって！
おかげで集中力が乱れてしまいました！
translation:
What was that 'shine on for tomorrow' thing?
You made me lose my concentration!

japanese: なんだ？　俺の応援が五月の足を引っ張ったと？
translation: What? Did my cheering slow down your progress, Itsuki?

japanese: そこまでは言いませんが……もういいです。
translation: I wouldn't go that far... But it's okay.

japanese:
いや、よくない。
思うところがあったら言ってくれないと
改善できないだろ。
translation:
Well, it's not okay.
If you have any concerns,
you have to tell me so we can improve, right?

japanese:
……なんだか調子が狂いっぱなしです。
でも、こうして口げんかするときだけは
いつも通りですね。
translation:
...Somehow, you're completely out of order.
But, it's just like usual when we argue like this.

japanese:
うんうん！
いいよいいよ、お兄ちゃん！
translation:
Yeah, yeah!
It's okay, big bro!

japanese: さーて！　いよいよ私たちの番だね！
translation: Alright then! It's finally our turn!

japanese: 勝てる気がしない……。
translation: I don't feel like I can win...

japanese: いやいや、勝負はやってみないとわからないよ？
translation: No, no, you won't know until you try, right?

japanese:
ねえ、フータロー。
私にもさっきみたいな元気が出る応援、してほしい。
translation:
Hey, Futaro.
I want you to cheer for me like you did earlier
to give me energy.

japanese: 任せておけ！
translation: Leave it to me!

japanese:
三玖、全力でやれ！
出し切れば勝利だ！
これは桶狭間の戦いだ！
translation:
Miku, give it your all!
If you give it your best shot, you'll win!
This is the battle of Okehazama!

japanese: ……わかった！　弱小大名の意地をみせる！
translation:
...Okay!
I'll show off the pride of a small feudal lord!

japanese:
むむむ～、こう足場が悪いと……
大きなストライドで行くのは無理かなぁ。
translation:
Mmmmhh, with this bad footing...
it's impossible to take big strides, huh.

japanese:
じゃあ、２人とも準備はいい？
よーい――
translation: Well, are you both ready? Ready%p-2;――%p; GO!

japanese: よっとっ！！
translation: Whoo!!

japanese:
くっ、さすがは四葉……でもっ！！
んん～～～～～～！！
translation:
Urg, of course, Yotsuba...!!
NNNNGH!!

japanese: おおっ、三玖もいいスタート！
translation: Ohh, Miku got a good start too!

japanese: だけど……。
translation: But...

japanese: あの子、もう息が上がってるわ。
translation: She's already out of breath.

japanese:
はぁ、はぁ、はぁ、はぁ……。
四葉……速すぎ……。
translation:
Haah, haah, haah, haah...
Yotsuba...you're too fast...

japanese: 三玖、頑張れ～！
translation: Miku, do your beeest!

japanese: 対戦相手にまで応援されてますね……。
translation: Even Miku's opponent is cheering for her...

japanese:
三玖、自分に負けるな！
見せてみろ、奇跡の大逆転劇を！
そして――
translation:
Miku, don't lose to yourself!
Show us the miracle of a big comeback!
And then%p-2;――

japanese: 明日に向かって光り輝けはなしで。
translation: Don't say, 'shine on for tomorrow.'
(Why not?!)

japanese: いえーい、私の勝ち！
translation: Yay, I win!

japanese: はぁ、はぁ……負け……ちゃった……。
translation: *pant* *pant* I...lost...

japanese: 三玖、楽しかったね！
translation: Miku, that was fun!

japanese:
うん……思ったよりも楽しかった。
でも、それはきっと四葉が相手だったから。
translation:
Yeah... It was more fun than I thought.
But that's probably because you were my opponent,
Yotsuba.

japanese: じゃあ、またやろっか！
translation: Alright, let's try it again!

japanese: ごめん、それはいい……。
translation: Sorry, but I'll pass...

japanese:
三玖、すごかったぞ！！
走ってるお前、最高に輝いてたぜ！
translation:
Miku, that was amazing!!
You were shining so brightly while you were running!

japanese: そ、そうかな……。
translation: I-I guess so...

japanese:
四葉もおめでとう！
相手を励ましたたえる姿に俺は感動を禁じ得ない！
まさにフェアプレーの精神だ！
translation:
Congratulations as well, Yotsuba!
Your sportsmanship in encouraging your opponent
is truly inspiring! It's the spirit of fair play!

japanese: あはは、そうでしょうか？
translation: Hahaha, now is that true?

japanese: 本当に、お前ら、最高だ！！
translation: You two! Are truly! AWESOME!!

japanese: （な、なんだ？）
translation: (Wh-what?)

japanese:
（いかん、テンションを上げすぎて……
　なんだか顔まで熱くなってきたみたいだ……）
translation:
(Oh no, I'm getting too excited...
 My face is starting to feel hot...)

japanese:
いい感じだよ、お兄ちゃん。
ここまで作戦は大成功だね！
translation:
We're doing well, big bro.
The plan has been a great success so far!

japanese: だったらよかった……。
translation: In that case, that's great...

japanese: うん、このままどんどん行ってみよう！
translation: Yeah, let's just keep on driving forward!

japanese: 何を言ってる、ここからが本番だろ。
translation: What are you saying? It has only just begun!

japanese: おおっ、やる気だね～！
translation: Oh, you're motivated! Great!

japanese:
中途半端にやっても意味はないからな。
やるなら全力だ。
translation:
There's no point in doing things halfway.
If we're going to do it, might as well go all the way.

japanese:
さすが！
頑張ってね、お兄ちゃん。
translation:
As expected of you!
Do your best, big bro.

japanese: これも、らいはのおかげだ。
translation: This is also thanks to you, Raiha.

japanese:
えへへ、そんなことないよ。
お兄ちゃんが頑張ってるからだよ。
translation:
Ehehe, that's not true.
It's because you're working hard, big bro.

japanese:
いや、らいはの応援があってこそだ。
もうしばらく見守っていてくれ。
translation:
No, it's thanks to your support.
Please continue to watch over me for a while longer.

japanese: うんっ！
translation: Yes!

japanese:
さて！　次は決勝戦だよ！
お兄ちゃん、一花さん、四葉さん、位置について。
translation:
Now then! It's time for the finals!
Big bro, Ichika-san, Yotsuba-san,
please take your positions.

japanese: 相手が四葉じゃ厳しいなぁ。
translation: It's tough with Yotsuba as the opponent.

japanese: 私だけじゃなくて、上杉さんもいるよ？
translation: Not just me, but Uesugi-san is also here, right?

japanese: いや、フータロー君は……ねぇ？
translation: Well, Futaro-kun is... You know?

japanese:
上杉さん、一花があんなこと言ってますよ？
これはビシッと格好いいところを
見せちゃいましょう！
translation:
Uesugi-san, did you just hear what Ichika said?
You'd better show her your cool side!

japanese: え？　あ？　何が……だ？
translation: Huh? Ah? What?

japanese: ん？　フータロー君？
translation: Hm? Futaro-kun?

japanese: （あれ？　なんか視界が揺れる……）
translation: (Huh? My vision is shaking...)

japanese:
フータロー？
体がふらふらしてるよ？
translation:
Futaro?
Your body is swaying, you know?

japanese: （あ、もしかしてこれ……）
translation: (Ah, could this possibly be...)

japanese: ま、また何か、おかしなことを……。
translation: A-are you, doing something weird again?

japanese: （夏のお約束の……）
translation: (The summer that was promised...)

japanese:
待って！
これ、本当に様子が変よ！
translation:
Wait!
There's really something wrong with him!

japanese: （熱中症ってやつじゃ……）
translation: (Heatstroke...?)

japanese: 上杉さん！？
translation: Uesugi-san?!

japanese: お兄ちゃーん！
translation: Big bro!
